DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine exposure light even positive influence physical performance regard endurance , strength reaction time .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Light Exposure Exercise Performance Dependent Chronotype .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : BMI 18 30 kg/m2 endurance performance > = 55 ml/min/kg peak oxygen uptake Exclusion criterion : cardiovascular disease renal dysfunction shiftworking travel time zone last 4 week high blood pressure ( systolic blood pressure > 170mmHg , diastolic blood pressure > 100mmHg ) depression
